description.value:
Dark thunderclouds swirl in a miniature storm, crisscrossed with lightning bolts; a tremendous thunderclap fills the air. The storm appears in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 60 feet. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -8)/3)+3)d12[electricity], 1d10[sonic]|traits:area-damage] damage, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A creature that fails its save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] until the end of its next turn (or for 1 minute on a critical failure). A creature wearing metal armor or made of metal takes a -1 circumstance penalty to its save.

Level (+3) The electricity damage increases by 1d12.
